connection_mode.title: Choose Connection Method
connection_mode.description: Select how you want to connect to Etsy

proxy_config.title: Configure Proxy Service
proxy_config.description: Enter the connection details for your secure Etsy proxy service

data_description.proxy_url: The URL of your proxy service (e.g., http://localhost:8000)
data_description.proxy_api_key: Your unique API key from the proxy service
data_description.hmac_secret: Shared secret for secure HMAC authentication

pick_implementation.title: Connect to Etsy
pick_implementation.description: This integration uses OAuth2 to securely connect to your Etsy account. Click continue to authenticate with Etsy.

shop_selection.title: Select Your Etsy Shop
shop_selection.description: Choose which Etsy shop to monitor. Found {num_shops} shop(s) for your account.

proxy_shop_selection.title: Select Your Etsy Shop
proxy_shop_selection.description: Choose which Etsy shop to monitor. Found {num_shops} shop(s) connected to the proxy.

direct_credentials.title: Enter Etsy API Credentials
direct_credentials.description: Enter your Etsy App credentials from the Etsy Developer Dashboard. You'll need your App Keystring and Shared Secret.

reauth.title: Re-enter Etsy API Credentials
reauth.description: Your Etsy credentials are missing or incomplete. Please re-enter them from your Etsy Developer Dashboard.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Etsy API Credentials
reconfigure.description: Update your Etsy API credentials for {shop_name}. You'll need your App Keystring and Shared Secret from the Etsy Developer Dashboard.

error.shop_access_denied: Unable to access the selected shop
error.no_shops_found: No shops found for your Etsy account
error.invalid_proxy: Failed to connect to proxy service. Please check URL and API key.

abort.no_shops_found: No shops found for your Etsy account
abort.proxy_not_ready: The proxy service is currently in development and will be available in a future update. Please use Direct API mode for now.
abort.reauth_successful: Re-authentication successful! Your credentials have been updated.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Reconfiguration successful! Your credentials have been updated.

init.title: Etsy Shop Options
init.description: Configure display settings for your Etsy shop data

data.transactions_display_limit: Number of recent orders to display

data_description.listings_display_limit: How many listings to show in sensor attributes (1-25)
data_description.transactions_display_limit: How many recent orders to show in sensor attributes (1-25)
data_description.stock_threshold: Alert when stock falls below this number (1-20)

refresh_data.name: Refresh Shop Data
refresh_data.description: Manually refresh Etsy shop data from the API

get_shop_stats.name: Get Shop Statistics
get_shop_stats.description: Retrieve current shop statistics and metrics

include_listings.name: Include Listings
include_listings.description: Whether to include detailed listing information

include_transactions.name: Include Transactions
include_transactions.description: Whether to include recent transaction details

application_credentials.description: Follow the instructions at [Etsy Developers](https://developers.etsy.com/documentation/getting_started) to create an OAuth application. Use `{redirect_uri}` as the redirect URI.
